issue.title: Footer messages in basket
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the basket's footer, the admin is able to manage two types of message :

- one when the user is not logged
- one when the user is logged in

see here (in the center of the flow) : https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/732/new_basket_flow_v2.png


Those two messages should be localized and, therefore, definable through the language files of Joomla!




**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Jérôme,
I do not see those 2 texts, either logged or not.

Do you have an explanation ?
